# Assets Directory

This directory contains images and assets for the SDK repository.

## Files

- `fleeks-logo.png` - Main Fleeks logo for README (600px width recommended)

## Instructions

To add the logo:
1. Save the Fleeks logo image as `fleeks-logo.png` in this directory
2. Recommended size: 600px wide (height auto-scales)
3. Format: PNG with transparent background preferred
4. The README will automatically display it once pushed to GitHub
